one_reviews_text: Impossible to go further than name indication. Oculus touch doesn't work to validate the name.

as game loads i hear my windows sound for a usb unpluged or pluged in. when game loads no touch controllers in hand show in game. i hit right menu button and in my home my hands show and work perfect. go back in game stuck and start screen. im on core 2.0. i cant even play so 1 star. will try again when i see this game gets a update in my list and change the rate after i play it............................................ edit 1-2-18
i see you didnt read in my post i said "no touch controllers in hand show in game. i hit right menu button and in my home my hands show and work perfect"
tells me you dont even read and have a copy and paste reply. i have touch controllers and they dont work in your game. with your game loaded i can back out with menu button and see my hands just fine. they dont show in your game. glad i got this for FREE. my rating will stay at a 1 and uninstall. i aways give a decent review and this one just got my final
--------Update 4/16/20 -------------------
i seen replys saing the touch controlles where fixed. nope you enter your name and stuck. you made it work to enter your name and cant even play. i give this 0 stars if i could. this has to be the worst game on oculus. i have never had a game that you cant even start
Game does not recognize touch controllers or allow player to progress past main menu. Gameplay looks lackluster based on trailer and content available for menu. Feels very much like a side-project.
review_feedback: I fixed the bugs and update new version. Thank you.

one_reviews_text: My oculus touch controllers are not seen by the game. Cant pick an option or do anything.
review_feedback: I fixed the bugs, please re try the game. Thank you.

We supported Oculus Touch.

review_title: It works and it's free, so 2 stars
one_reviews_text: I can't really recommend this title.  It's a boring gallery shooter.  Fast animals are thrown and you're supposed to shoot them as they whiz on by.  I was #3 on the leaderboards after three attempts.  Too bored to try to go for #1.  If you don't have any money and have a lot of time on your hands and need more VR stuff, I guess download it as long as it's free.  Otherwise, not worth it.
review_feedback:
Thank you for playing Oh my cooking gun and your review!
Your review is right. We will be more advanced and we are preparing for more interesting updates in the future. Try to attempt first at leaderboard!
Best regards,
Mason KIM representative of Fake Eyes.

Thank you for playing Oh my cooking gun and your review!
We will try to harder than until now.
Best regards,
Mason KIM representative of Fake Eyes.

one_reviews_text: I think it's interesting to think that animals are made into food by shooting them.
